positions.description: AY Ventures helps startups and companies raise funding from angels, VCs and Family Offices by arranging direct meetings with investors.AY Ventures VisionAt AY Ventures, the driving force is to create a direct link between promising startups and potential investors. The team excels in orchestrating meetings between founders and investors, seamlessly facilitating connections that are often the lifeblood of startup success. Through virtual meetings and streamlined communication, AY Ventures ensures a smooth and efficient fundraising process for startups.It also provide other fundraising-related services, such as preparing pitch decks, business plans, valuation, Startup India registration, Mentorship and incubation/acceleration for early-stage startups.AY Ventures Profile : bit.ly/AYVProfileüìû 0803 507 4044
positions.title: Investment Analyst
positions.description_html:
AY Ventures helps startups and companies raise funding from angels, VCs and Family Offices by arranging direct meetings with investors.

AY Ventures Vision
At AY Ventures, the driving force is to create a direct link between promising startups and potential investors. The team excels in orchestrating meetings between founders and investors, seamlessly facilitating connections that are often the lifeblood of startup success. Through virtual meetings and streamlined communication, AY Ventures ensures a smooth and efficient fundraising process for startups.

It also provide other fundraising-related services, such as preparing pitch decks, business plans, valuation, Startup India registration, Mentorship and incubation/acceleration for early-stage startups.

AY Ventures Profile : bit.ly/AYVProfile
